required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Endoscopic Preperitoneal Parastomal Hernia Repair (ePauli Repair)
clinical_study.official_title: Endoscopic Preperitoneal Parastomal Hernia Repair (ePauli Repair)

brief_summary.textblock: Observational study on laparoscopic and robotic extraperitoneal mesh repair of parastomal hernia, employing TAR.

detailed_description.textblock: Endoscopic trans-abdominal preperitoneal plasty (TAPP) for parastomal hernia emplying transversus abdominis release component separation (TAR) and reinforcement with mesh after the Sugarbaker principle, but placing mesh extraabdominally, anteriorly to the transversalis fascia. Laparoscopic and robotic procedures. Repair of concomitant midline hernia with endoscopic enhanced-view Rives-Stoppa technique.

intervention.intervention_name: endoscopic preperitoneal repair of parastomal hernia
intervention.description: repair of parastomal hernia after the Sugarbaker principle with TAR and preperitoneal mesh reinforcement

study_pop.textblock: Patients with permanent ostomy and parastomal hernia in need of repair

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- parastomal hernia with need of repair
Exclusion Criteria:
- < 18 years
